info.name: shape in grid illusion
info.description:
reference: https://twitter.com/AkiyoshiKitaoka/status/1663855123465138176
better seen around resolution 800 x 450

renderpass.code:
#define S(v)    smoothstep( 10./R.y, 0., v )                   // AA draw
#define d(p)  ( p.y -= 3., h = abs(atan(p.x,p.y)/3.14),                \
                length(p)/10.5 - h*(13. - 22.*h + 10.*h*h)/(6.-5.*h) )// shape: heart from iq https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XsfGRn
//#define d(p)  length(p) - 6.                                        // shape: disc
#define L(F)    S( abs(F.y) - .005 ) * sign(F.x) * s                  // BW line 

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{   float h, s,v;
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = 8. * ( 2.*u - R ) / R.y,                    
          I = floor(U),                           // cell Id
          F = fract(U)-.5,                        // cell coords
          G = F + vec2(-F.y,F) * sign(d(U)),      // diamond frame ( tilted in shape )
          D = S(abs(G)-.2);                       // diamond mask
          s = mod(I.x+I.y,2.)*2.-1.,              // checkered sign
          v = mix( L(F) + L(F.yx),                // horizontal & vertical lines
                   sign(G.y)*s, D.x*D.y );        // diamonds
    O = vec4(sqrt(.5+.5*v));                      // to [0,1] and to sRGB
}
renderpass.name: Image
